activities: Suddath International only collects Name, Mailing Address, and Email address for contact purposes. Users provide PII on our website by completing Registration Forms, Newsletter Sign-up, Contact Us request, and Request forms. We do not associate automatically collected information with users PII, nor do we share it with third parties. Users can opt-out of receiving communications via online, via email, reply to "unsubscribe", via Telephone, via postal mail. We notify users of changes in our web-sites privacy practices, including changes in the use of PII via a Notice on our website. Agents and service providers sign non-disclosure agreements pertaining to users PII.  Users can access and correct their PII via Online at point of collection, via email, and via telephone. We do not store users PII on computers that are not connected to the internet. Employee's and Agsnts/Service providers access to users PII is on a need-to-know basis. PII is ratined for 3 years for Payment Card Industry.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Name, Mailing address and Email Address. This includes Manually processed data.
